mapper.sql: CDLDATE, CDLSEQNO, CDLTYPE, CDLMKT, CDLCNO, CDLCID, CDLCMKT, CDLMCARD, CDLFLAG, CDLTRANS, CDLBILLNO, CDLBILLID, CDLOPERID, CDLMEMO, CDLSYJID, CDLINVNO, CDLTRACE, CDLXFJE, CDLZKJE, CDLCURJFFS, CDLHISJFFS, CDLCURJFYE, CDLHISJFYE, CDLTOTJFYE, CDLCURXFJE, CDLHISXFJE, CDLTOTXFJE, CDLVALIDDATE, CDLDATE1, CDLDATE2, CDLDATE3, CDLNUM1, CDLNUM2, CDLNUM3, CDLNUM4, CDLNUM5, CDLNUM6, CDLNUM7, CDLNUM8, CDLNUM9, CDLNUM10, CDLCHR1, CDLCHR2, CDLCHR3, CDLCHR4, CDLCHR5, CDLCHR6, CDLCHR7, CDLCHR8, CDLCHR9, CDLCHR10, CDLMID, CDLJFA, CDLJFB, CDLJFC, CDLJFD, CDLJFE, CDLJFF, CDLJFHK, CDLYSEQNO
mapper.select: select CDLCURJFYE from ( select CDLCURJFYE from CARDJFLOG c, (select CDMCID from CARDMAIN where CDMSTATUS = 'Y' and CDMFLAG != '05' and rownum=1 and CDMCID = #{cmcustid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) cdm where c.CDLCID = #{cmcustid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cdm.CDMCID = c.CDLCID order by CDLDATE desc ) where rownum=1
select SUM(CDLCURJFFS) as total from CARDJFLOG where CDLCURJFFS < 0 AND CDLCID = #{cmcustid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SUM(CDLCURJFFS) as total from CARDJFLOG where CDLCURJFFS > 0 AND CDLCID = #{cmcustid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select CDLCURJFYE from ( select CDLCURJFYE from CARDJFLOG where CDLCID = (select CMCUSTID from CUSTMEMBER where CMMOBILE1= #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) order by CDLDATE desc ) where rownum=1

update CARDJFLOG
CDLTYPE = #{cdltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CDLMKT = #{cdlmkt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CDLCID = #{cdlcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
